senses.sense_definition: Slavic peoples considered as a collective group.

examples.text: The concept of <w>Slavdom</w> played a major role in the political rhetoric of the nineteenth century.
Scholars gathered to discuss the shared cultural heritage and future unity of <w>Slavdom</w>.

senses.sense_definition: The geographical region inhabited by Slavic peoples.

examples.text: This historical map illustrates the vast extent of <w>Slavdom</w> across Eastern Europe.
Cultural influences from outside <w>Slavdom</w> began to appear in the local architecture.
